content.question: Based on the graph, which of the following events or processes in the twentieth century is associated with the greatest rate of decrease in Mexicoâ€™s birth rate?

choices.label: Advances in vaccines and the treatment of diseases in the second half of the century
Greater availability of more effective family-planning techniques after circa 1970

content.answer: Greater availability of more effective family-planning techniques after circa 1970

topic.text: 9.1: Advances in Technology and Exchange after 1900

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
